quotes.quote: Revenge is a dish best served cold.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: I’m trying real hard to be the shepherd.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: They call it a Royale with cheese.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: Zed’s dead, baby. Zed’s dead.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: The path of the righteous man is beset on all sides by the inequities of the selfish and the tyranny of evil men.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: Hamburgers! The cornerstone of any nutritious breakfast.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: You know what they call a Quarter Pounder with Cheese in Paris? A Royale with Cheese.
quotes.author: Quentin Tarantino

quotes.quote: You must understand that there is more than one path to the top of the mountain.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: Perceive that which cannot be seen with the eye.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: The ultimate aim of martial arts is not having to use them.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: Do nothing that is of no use.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: In battle, if you make your opponent flinch, you have already won.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: Music is the soul of language.
quotes.author: Nujabes

quotes.quote: The music is not in the notes, but in the silence between.
quotes.author: Nujabes

quotes.quote: Life is a journey, not a destination.
quotes.author: Nujabes

quotes.quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our character.
quotes.author: Nujabes

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Nujabes

quotes.quote: An idea is like a virus, resilient, highly contagious.
quotes.author: Dom Cobb

quotes.quote: You can't change the past, but you can learn from it.
quotes.author: Hanamichi Sakuragi

quotes.quote: I think... I’m finally starting to understand what ‘team’ means.
quotes.author: Kaede Rukawa

quotes.quote: See you, space cowboy...
quotes.author: Narrator

quotes.quote: Bang.
quotes.author: Spike Spiegel

quotes.quote: Whatever happens, happens.
quotes.author: Spike Spiegel

quotes.quote: There’s no way to be prepared for a life of fighting.
quotes.author: Mugen

quotes.quote: I live by my own rules.
quotes.author: Jin

quotes.quote: The path to enlightenment requires more than just skill with a sword.
quotes.author: Jin

quotes.quote: Fear is the enemy of freedom.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: Perfection is not for the faint-hearted.
quotes.author: Miyamoto Musashi

quotes.quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Don’t walk behind me; I may not lead. Don’t walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken.
quotes.author: Albert Camus
